name: Plot Castle
typedesc: Blueprints are used to place buildings on your personal plots in guilds to help you gain the new currency based on the actions of other players! They all start as level 1 and are upgradable from there.
desc: The first and required building for plots
fulldesc: The castle is the protector of your lemons. Contributions are made to the castle daily even if no player has used the server. As it gets upgraded the castle allows your other buildings to store more lemon revenue before reaching their limit.

levels.desc: Generates 30 lemons every 24 hours, allows you to place other buildings on plots in the same server.
Increases all buildings storage capacity in placed guild by 50%, increases daily generation to 40
Increases all buildings storage capacity in placed guild by 75%, increases daily generation to 50
Increases all buildings storage capacity in placed guild by 100%, increases daily generation to 60
Increases all buildings storage capacity in placed guild by 125%, increases daily generation to 70

name: Gacha Bank
fulldesc: The Gacha Bank stores lemons from when users run daily or claim cards.

levels.desc: Gives lemons when a user does daily
Gives lemons when a user claims cards or does daily

name: Tavern
desc: Gives lemons with achievements and quests

levels.desc: Gives lemons when someone completes an achievement in the guild
Gives lemons when someone completes a quest or achievement in the guild

name: Smithing Hub
desc: Gives lemons with forge, liq, draw
fulldesc: The smithing hub provides lemons when users run draw, liq, or forge. Payouts are determined based on building level

levels.desc: Gives lemons when people forge cards
Gives lemons when people forge or liquefy cards
Gives lemons when people forge, liquefy, or draw  cards

name: Auction House
fulldesc: Grants lemons for commands related to auctions

levels.desc: Gives lemons when someone successfully bids on an auction
Gives 2x lemons when someone successfully bids on an auction
Gives 3x lemons when someone successfully bids on an auction

name: Gift From Tohru
typedesc: Use Effect Card recipes to obtain usable or passive Effect Cards
fulldesc: When used gives you **Gift From Tohru** effect card. This is a passive item, so make sure you equip it into hero's effect card slot

fulldesc: When used gives you **Cake Day** effect card. This is a passive item, so make sure you equip it into hero's effect card slot

fulldesc: When used gives you **The Holy Grail** effect card. This is a passive item, so make sure you equip it into hero's effect card slot

fulldesc: When used gives you **Cherry Blossoms** effect card. This is a passive item, so make sure you equip it into hero's effect card slot

fulldesc: When used gives you **Onwards To Victory** effect card. This is a passive item, so make sure you equip it into hero's effect card slot

name: The Ruler Jeanne
fulldesc: When used gives you **The Ruler Jeanne** effect card. This is a passive item, so make sure you equip it into hero's effect card slot

name: Impossible Spell Card
fulldesc: When used gives you **Impossible Spell Card**. This is a passive item, so make sure you equip it into hero's effect card slot

name: Festival of Wishes
fulldesc: When used gives you **Festival of Wishes** effect card. This is a passive item, so make sure you equip it into hero's effect card slot

name: Enlightened Ayano
fulldesc: When used gives you **Enlightened Ayano** effect card. This is a usable card

name: Powerful Bocchi
fulldesc: When used gives you **Powerful Bocchi** effect card. This is a usable card

fulldesc: When used gives you **The Space Unity** effect card. This is a usable card

name: The Judgment Day
fulldesc: When used gives you **The Judgment Day** effect card. This is a usable card

name: Claim Recall
fulldesc: When used gives you **Claim Recall** effect card. This is a usable card

name: Memories of Christmas Cheer
fulldesc: When used gives you **Memories of Christmas Cheer** effect card. Has a 1 in 12 chance to give a missing card, 1 missing is guaranteed per 12. This is a usable card

name: Memories of Halloween Frights
fulldesc: When used gives you **Memories of Halloween Frights** effect card. Has a 1 in 12 chance to give a missing card, 1 missing is guaranteed per 12.  This is a usable card

name: Memories of Birthdays Past
fulldesc: When used gives you **Memories of Birthdays Past** effect card. Has a 1 in 12 chance to give a missing card, 1 missing is guaranteed per 12.  This is a usable card

name: Memories of Valentines Day
fulldesc: When used gives you **Memories of Valentines Day** effect card. Has a 1 in 12 chance to give a missing card, 1 missing is guaranteed per 12.  This is a usable card

name: Legendary Card Claim Ticket
fulldesc: When used gives you legendary card. The collection is determined when awarded

name: 1 Star Claim Ticket
typedesc:
Claim tickets are used to claim cards of certain rarity, collection, or both. They are gotten either by resetting collections or purchasing from the store.
**Only 3 items in this store can be bought per day!**
fulldesc: When used gives you a random 1 star card.

name: 2 Star Claim Ticket
fulldesc: When used gives you a random 2 star card.

name: 3 Star Claim Ticket
fulldesc: When used gives you a random 3 star card

name: Triple 1 Star Claim Ticket
desc: gives 3 random, single collection, 1 star cards
fulldesc: When used gives you 3 random 1 star cards from a single collection

name: Triple 2 Star Claim Ticket
desc: gives 3 random, single collection, 2 star cards
fulldesc: When used gives you 3 random 2 star cards from a single collection

name: Triple 3 Star Claim Ticket
desc: gives 3 random, single collection, 3 star cards
fulldesc: When used gives you 3 random 3 star cards from a single collection

name: Triple Random 1 Star Claim Ticket
fulldesc: When used gives you 3 random 3 star cards from randomly chosen collections

name: Triple Random 2 Star Claim Ticket
fulldesc: When used gives you 3 random 2 star cards from randomly chosen collections

name: Triple Random 3 Star Claim Ticket
fulldesc: When used gives you 3 random 3 star cards from randomly chosen collections

name: Effect Slot Upgrade
typedesc: Welcome to the bonus store! This store will hold items purchasable with lemons that don't quite fit into any other category. Be it upgrades or misc items, you can find them here!
fulldesc:
This item, when used, increases the amount of passive effect slots you have for 30 days. The ability to use one is unlocked every 100 levels.
Check your level with `/profile`

name: Effect Use Increase
fulldesc: Each use of this item with a valid effect will increase it's use by 1 or expiry by 1 day.

name: Legendary Card Swapper
fulldesc: When used on a legendary card, swaps it for another random legendary in the same collection.

name: Lemonade Stand
typedesc: This is the **GUILD** store! To purchase items here you need to be either the server owner or designated as a manager! Any items bought here will be taken from the guild's balance and immediately built.
fulldesc: The lemonade stand increases the lemon capacity of every user plot building by a specific percentage per level. If this building becomes disabled or is downgraded, the excess lemons stored in plots will be voided.

levels.desc: Increase plot lemon capacity by 10%
Increase plot lemon capacity by 20%
Increase plot lemon capacity by 30%
Increase plot lemon capacity by 40%
Increase plot lemon capacity by 50%

name: Processing Plant
fulldesc: The processing plant increases the base payout for daily by specific percentages each level, and increases plot payouts by another percentage depending on level.

levels.desc: Increase payout of base daily by 5%
Increase payout of base daily by 10% and increases plot payouts by 10%
Increase payout of base daily by 15% and increases plot payouts by 10%
Increase payout of base daily by 20% and increases plot payouts by 15%

name: Pachinko Hall
desc: Increases claim chances of either specials or legendaries
fulldesc: The Pachinko Hall increases your chances to claim either a special or legendary card. This is additive so if Specials are a 2% chance to drop, it will be 4%

levels.desc: Increase Special claim chance by 2%
Increase Legendary claim chance by 1% (Does not increase special chance)

name: Arcade Center
fulldesc: The arcade center increases the chance of claiming a specific rarity by 10% per claim, depending on level

levels.desc: Increase chances of a 1 star card in any claim by 10%
Increase chances of a 2 star card in any claim by 10%
Increase chances of a 3 star card in any claim by 10%

name: Pamper Central
fulldesc: High Maintenance fees got you down? Get yourself down to Pamper Central and reduce the stress from fees by reducing the fees!

levels.desc: Decrease maintenance fees by 5%
Decrease maintenance fees by 10%
Decrease maintenance fees by 15%
Decrease maintenance fees by 20%

name: Discount Center
fulldesc: Reduces the final auction fee by a certain percentage per level. (e.g. At level 2, an auction list fee of 100 would become 90)

levels.desc: Decrease auction fee by 5%
Decrease auction fee by 10%
Decrease auction fee by 15%
Decrease auction fee by 20%

name: Soda Shop
desc: Get a bit of a.... boost
fulldesc: This item will do a thing

levels.desc: Increase the chance of claiming a specific collection by 2%
Increase the chance of claiming a specific collection by 4%
Increase the chance of claiming a specific collection by 6%
Increase the chance of claiming a specific collection by 8%
Increase the chance of claiming a specific collection by 10%
